author: Kaelan Deese
title: Divorces skyrocket in China amid lockdown
description: Divorce rates have made a sharp increase in China as mandatory lockdowns have been put in place aimed at curbing the spread of the coronavirus....
content:
Divorce rates have made a sharp increase in China as mandatory lockdowns have been put in place aimed at curbing the spread of the coronavirus. 
There has also been an increase in domestic violence reports.
Chinese cities such as Xian and Dazhou recorded re… [+2736 chars]
